caption: MCP Server Connection
description: Base connection configuration for accessing an MCP server.
name: mcp_server_connection

url.caption: URL
url.description: URL of the server endpoint (required for streamable-http and sse transports).

command.caption: Command
command.description: Executable or runtime command (for stdio transport).

env_vars.caption: Environment Variables
env_vars.description: Environment variables such as tokens or API keys.

headers.caption: Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers for authentication (for HTTP-based transports).
